page.title: 15Industry.
page.content: Near our school, there are several industrial works. These two, described by two children, are typical. 'Steadfast Engineering makes special fasteners, like nuts and bolts. They are used on gas and oil pipelines. There are 23 workers, and the firm started 8 years ago. All their goods are sent to America, The Middle East, Europe and Britain. We found this out by phoning the firm on its radiophone number. They were very helpful, and pleased to be included in the survey.' Parker Timber deals with all kinds of wood. They make mouldings, joinery timber, pallets, timber frames, constructional and fencing timber, farmwork timber and shutterply. We were surprised to learn that the firm is closing down in two weeks time. Some people will lose their jobs.'
